input_email_body:
Subject: Problem encountered with the data analytics platform

Hello Customer Support, I am contacting you to address an issue I have experienced with the data analytics platform. It suddenly froze, and I suspect it could be due to a recent software update that is not compatible. After restarting the system and updating it, the issue still remains. Could you please look into this and provide a solution at your earliest convenience? I can provide any additional information you may need to resolve this issue. Your prompt attention is appreciated You can reach me at omar.hassan@secure.net.. Thanks, [Your Name] My name is John Doe.
